caption.text: Impact of women’s empowerment interaction with technology adoption on WDDS, multiple treatment results.

cell.text: Women’s empowerment for non-PPT adopting households (actual = t1 and counterfactual = t0)
Women’s empowerment for PPT adopting households (actual = t2 and counterfactual = t3)
PPT adoption for households with disempowered women (actual = t3 and counterfactual = t0)
PPT adoption for households with empowered women (actual = t2 and counterfactual = t1)

statement.text: There are 4 different types of treatment in the given table.
Each treatment has a different values from each other.
In summary, our results indicate that womens empowerment boosts the dietary diversity gains from agricultural technology adoption, for the case of PPT adoption in Kenya.
